name: 李志鴻
objective:
最佳化問題簡介。梯度法。線性規劃問題。無限制條件數值解法。有限制條件數值解法。非梯度法。其他最佳化設計法。多重領域系統設計最佳化等等。
Introduction of optimization problem, gradient method, linear programming problem, numerical methods for problems with no constraints, numerical methods for problems with constraints, non-gradient methods, other optimization design methods, multidisciplinary system design optimization
schedule:
第一週　　最佳化設計介紹(1.1-1.3, 2.2)/Introduction of design optimization
第二週　　無限制條件最佳解(3.1-3.2)/Unconstrained minimization
第三週　　有限制條件最佳解(5.1-5.2)/Constrained minimization
第四週　　有限制條件最佳解(5.3-5.4)/Constrained minimization
第五週　　高斯喬登消去法及凸集(1.4, 2.2, 3.3, 5.5)/Gauss-Jordan elimination, Convesity
第六週　　線性規劃問題(4.1-4.2)/Linear programming
第七週　　線性規劃問題(4.3)/Linear programming
第八週　　無限制條件數值解法(2.3-2.5)/Unconstrained minimization with numerical method
第九週　　期中考/Mid-term examination
第十週　　無限制條件數值解法(3.4-3.5最陡下降法)/Unconstrained minimization with numerical method (Gradient descent)
第十一週　　無限制條件數值解法(3.6共軛梯度法、3.7牛頓法)/ Unconstrained minimization with numerical method (Conjugate gradient method, Newton’s method)
第十二週　　有限制條件數值解法(6.1、逐次無制限極小化法、6.2懲罰函數法、6.3障礙函數法)/Constrained minimization with numerical method/(Sequential unconstrained minimization method, penalty function method, barrier function method)
第十三週　　有限制條件數值解法(逐次線性規劃法、5.10逐次二次規劃法)/Constrained minimization with numerical method (Sequential linear programming, Sequential quadratic programming)
第十四週　　非梯度法(7.1、7.2地毯搜尋法、隨機跳躍法、隨機漫步法)/Non-gradient method(
第十五週　　非梯度法(7.7模擬退火法、8.1-8.4整數規劃法) /Non-gradient method (Simulated annealing, Integer and discrete programming)
第十六週　　非梯度法(7.8基因演算法) /Non-gradient method (Genetic algorithm)
第十七週　　強化學習法/Reinforcement learning
第十八週　　期末考試/Final examination
scorePolicy:
作業或小考/homework and quiz:20%
期中考/mid-term examination:30%
期末考/final examination:30%
出席率/attendance:20%
materials:
教材:
Ashok D. Belegundu, Tirupathi R. Chandrupatla, "Optimization Concepts and Applications in Engineering", ISBN 986-7594-27-4, Pearson
參考書目:
Panos Y. Papalambros and Douglass J. Wilde, “Principles of Optimal Design–Modeling and Computation”, 2nd edition, ISBN 0 521 62727 3, (paperback), Cambridge University Press, 2000 –Recommended
